class.name: AudioStreamCsound
class.description: Audio stream that is used to drive the creation of audio in a Csound instance.

method.name: csound_layout_changed
method.description: Method to notify AudioStreamCsound when Csound layout has changed. This is used internally to update the property list.

method.name: csound_ready
method.description: Method to notify when a Csound instance is ready. The [param csound_name] specifies the name of the csound instance.

method.name: get_csound_name
method.description: Gets the name of the Csound instance that should be used to generate audio.

method.name: get_stream_name
method.description: The name assigned to this audio stream. Unused by the engine.

method.name: set_csound_name
method.description: Sets the [param name] of the Csound instance that should be used to generate audio.
